Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is not just any item; it's an investment in efficiency, quality, and innovation. Given its value and the benefits it provides, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while securing your commitment to us. We believe in building long-term relationships and trust, and we're confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you need more information or have any questions. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
